Package org.marjoriekohn.diningreview.exception

Class RestaurantNotFoundException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
org.marjoriekohn.diningreview.exception.BaseException
org.marjoriekohn.diningreview.exception.RestaurantNotFoundException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class RestaurantNotFoundException extends BaseException
Thrown to indicate that a restaurant could not be found based on the provided criteria. This exception extends BaseException and can be thrown in various contexts, such as when searching for a restaurant by ID, or when applying more complex filtering criteria like zipcode and allergy information.
See Also:

  • RestaurantRepository
  • RestaurantService

    Description
    RestaurantNotFoundException(Long restaurantId)
    Constructs a RestaurantNotFoundException when a restaurant with a given ID is not found.

    Constructs a RestaurantNotFoundException with a detailed custom message.
    RestaurantNotFoundException(String zipCode, String allergy)
    Constructs a RestaurantNotFoundException when no restaurants meet the given zipcode and allergy criteria.

    • RestaurantNotFoundException

      public RestaurantNotFoundException(Long restaurantId)
      Constructs a RestaurantNotFoundException when a restaurant with a given ID is not found.
      Parameters:
      restaurantId - the ID of the restaurant that could not be found, required

    • RestaurantNotFoundException

      public RestaurantNotFoundException(String zipCode, String allergy)
      Constructs a RestaurantNotFoundException when no restaurants meet the given zipcode and allergy criteria.
      Parameters:
      zipCode - the zipcode used for filtering, required
      allergy - the allergy criteria used for filtering, required

    • RestaurantNotFoundException

      public RestaurantNotFoundException(String detailMessage)
      Constructs a RestaurantNotFoundException with a detailed custom message.
      Parameters:
      detailMessage - the detailed message explaining the reason for the exception, required
